title: Complete React Native Bootcamp
description: Master React Native in 2024. Build iOS and Android apps from scratch using a single codebase. Includes Expo, Navigation, and Redux.
whatYouWillLearn: Build native mobile apps with React Native
Master the latest React Hooks and Context API
Implement complex navigation with React Navigation
Publishing to Apple App Store and Google Play

reviews.comment: Sarah is an amazing instructor. The section on deployment saved me hours of headache.
Great course, but the section on animations could be a bit deeper. Otherwise perfect.

title: Advanced CSS and Sass: Flexbox, Grid, Animations
description: The most advanced and modern CSS course on the internet: master flexbox, CSS Grid, responsive design, and so much more.
whatYouWillLearn: Advanced CSS animations with @keyframes, transitions and transforms
CSS architecture: component-based design, BEM, writing reusable code

reviews.comment: This changed how I write CSS forever. The BEM methodology section is gold.
Finally understood Grid layout thanks to Jonas.

title: Python for Data Science and Machine Learning
description: Learn how to use NumPy, Pandas, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Plotly, Scikit-Learn, Machine Learning, Tensorflow, and more!
whatYouWillLearn: Use Python for Data Science and Machine Learning
Learn to use NumPy for Numerical Data
Data Visualization with Matplotlib and Seaborn

reviews.comment: Very comprehensive. Some of the library versions need updating in the videos.
Excellent introduction to the data science stack.

title: The Complete JavaScript Course 2024
description: The modern JavaScript course for everyone! Master JavaScript with projects, challenges and theory. Many courses in one!
whatYouWillLearn: Modern OOP: Classes, constructors, prototypal inheritance
Event loop and how the engine works

reviews.comment: Max explains the 'why' not just the 'how'. Best JS course out there.

title: UI/UX Design Masterclass
description: Learn to design beautiful interfaces and user experiences. Covers Figma, prototyping, wireframing, and design theory.
whatYouWillLearn: Understand typography, color theory, and layout

reviews.comment: I'm a developer and this helped me improve my design skills significantly.
Great content, but wished for more Adobe XD examples.

title: Docker & Kubernetes: The Practical Guide
description: Build, test, and deploy Docker applications with Kubernetes while learning production-style development workflows.

reviews.comment: Complex topics made simple. The diagrams really help.

title: Mastering Redux Toolkit
description: Stop struggling with state management. Learn Redux Toolkit, RTK Query, and advanced state patterns in React.

reviews.comment: RTK Query changed my life. Thanks Dave!
Short, sweet, and to the point. No fluff.

title: Ethical Hacking: Beginner to Advanced
description: Learn ethical hacking, penetration testing, and network security skills. Hands-on labs with Kali Linux.
prerequisites: Understanding of networks is a plus

reviews.comment: Practical and hands-on. The labs are great.

title: Flutter & Dart - The Complete Guide
description: A Complete Guide to the Flutter SDK & Flutter Framework for building native iOS and Android apps.
whatYouWillLearn: Dart programming language basics to advanced
State management with Provider and Riverpod

reviews.comment: Good course, but very long. Takes dedication.

title: SQL - The Complete Analyst Bootcamp
description: Master SQL for Data Analysis. Learn MySQL and Database Design. Great for business intelligence aspirants.

reviews.comment: Perfect for beginners. Maven Analytics always delivers quality.

title: Rust Programming: The Complete Developer's Guide
description: Learn Rust from scratch! Master the best modern systems programming language and build real-world applications.
prerequisites: Experience with C/C++ or another systems language helpful

reviews.comment: Hardest language to learn, but this course made it clickable.

title: Adobe Illustrator CC - Essentials Training
description: Learn Adobe Illustrator CC graphic design, logo design, and more with this in-depth, practical course.

reviews.comment: Dan is the best teacher. Funny and informative.

title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate
description: Ultimate AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate (SAA-C03) exam prep. Hands-on labs and practice exams.
whatYouWillLearn: Pass the AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate Exam
Design highly available and scalable systems
Master S3, EC2, RDS, Lambda, and DynamoDB

reviews.comment: Passed my exam with a score of 920 thanks to this.
Stephane is the king of AWS courses.

title: C++: From Beginner to Expert
description: Designed for people who don't have any knowledge about the programming and want to program in C++.

reviews.comment: Solid foundation, but audio quality could be better in early videos.

title: Machine Learning A-Z: Python & R in Data Science
description: Learn to create Machine Learning Algorithms in Python and R from two Data Science experts.
whatYouWillLearn: Master Machine Learning on Python & R

reviews.comment: The intuition videos are brilliant.

title: Modern TypeScript: The Complete Guide
description: Master TypeScript by learning how to configure it, using it with the DOM and React, and understanding advanced types.

reviews.comment: Shaun (Net Ninja) is a legend. Clear and concise.

title: Unreal Engine 5 C++ Developer: Learn C++ & Make Games
description: Create video games using Unreal Engine 5 and C++. The ultimate game developer course for beginners.

reviews.comment: Great introduction to UE5. Some bugs in the later sections but support is good.

title: Excel Essentials: The Complete Excel Series
description: Learn Excel from beginner to advanced. Formulas, Pivot Tables, Macros, and VBA.
whatYouWillLearn: Create dynamic reports with Pivot Tables
Automate tasks with Macros and VBA

reviews.comment: Very practical examples.

title: The Ultimate Go (Golang) Programming Course
description: Master Go (Golang) syntax, structures, and concurrency. Build fast, scalable backend systems.

reviews.comment: Go is the future. This course covers everything needed to get hired.

title: Digital Marketing Masterclass: Get Your First 1,000 Customers
description: Grow your business with Social Media Marketing, Content Marketing, Email Marketing, and SEO.
prerequisites: A business or product to market

reviews.comment: Good overview, a bit generic on some topics but good for beginners.
